member.name: M:KreateITWebService.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:KreateITWebService.Attributes.BasicAuthenticationFilter
member.summary:
Generic Basic Authentication filter that checks for basic authentication headers and challenges for authentication if no authentication is provided Sets the Thread Principle with a GenericAuthenticationPrincipal.
You can override the OnAuthorize method for custom auth logic that might be application specific.
member.remarks: Always remember that Basic Authentication passes username and passwords from client to server in plain text, so make sure SSL is used with basic auth to encode the Authorization header on all requests (not just the login).

member.name: M:KreateITWebService.Attributes.BasicAuthenticationFilter.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Overriden constructor to allow explicit disabling of this filter's behavior. Pass false to disable (same as no filter but declarative)

member.name: M:KreateITWebService.Attributes.BasicAuthenticationFilter.OnAuthorization(System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpActionContext)
member.summary: Override to Web API filter method to handle Basic Auth check

member.name: M:KreateITWebService.Attributes.BasicAuthenticationFilter.OnAuthorizeUser(System.String,System.String,System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpActionContext)
member.summary:
Base implementation for user authentication - you probably will want to override this method for application specific logic.
The base implementation merely checks for username and password present and set the Thread principal.
Override this method if you want to customize Authentication and store user data as needed in a Thread Principle or other Request specific storage.

member.name: M:KreateITWebService.Attributes.BasicAuthenticationFilter.ParseAuthorizationHeader(System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpActionContext)
member.summary: Parses the Authorization header and creates user credentials

member.name: M:KreateITWebService.Attributes.BasicAuthenticationFilter.Challenge(System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpActionContext)
member.summary: Send the Authentication Challenge request

member.name: P:KreateITWebService.Attributes.BasicAuthenticationIdentity.Password
member.summary: Basic Auth Password for custom authentication
